mean_cn: n. 共振；回声；（情感等的）共鸣
mean_en: the sound or other vibration produced in an object by sound or vibrations of a similar frequency from another object
sentence: The students were amazed by the tuning-fork resonance experiment in physics class.
sentence_trans: 学生们对物理课上的音叉共振实验感到惊讶。
word_etyma: re再 ＋ son声音 ＋ ance名词后缀 → resonance反响；共鸣
